Sign In ONLINE ORDERING My Order Your Bag is empty Subtotal: $0 View Bag | Checkout Start your order Button trigger modal ABOUT US 28 LOCATIONS 1M Burgers served annually 39 years family owned & operated $1M+ Donated Since 2016 Duffy's Drafthouse The original “Duffy’s Drafthouse”, was founded by two childhood friends turned business partners in Lake Park, Florida in 1985. Learn more Paul Emmett Remembered Paul purchased the original four Duffy’s Drafthouse locations in 2001, and brought to them his vision for the future. Rebranding the concept Duffy’s Sports Grill, he transformed a few beloved local establishments into the sports-themed, casual-dining phenomenon we know today. Learn more Duffy's Foundation Our Mission: Benefitting organizations and individuals who positively impact their local communities. Learn more PRESS HIGHLIGHTS View More Articles November 2023 Talking turkey: Thanksgiving around Orlando Read More November 2023 Veterans Day events happening around Tampa Bay Read More November 2023 Watch parties: Best restaurants, bars for watching Miami Dolphins vs. Chiefs game in Germany Read More September 2023 6 great sports bars to watch football in Naples, Cape Coral, Marco, Fort Myers Beach Read More September 2023 Duffy's Sports Grill Gears Up For Tailgating Season! Read More September 2023 Football fans will spend money this season but still be frugal, business analysts predict Read More MENU EVENTS PARTY PLATTERS LOCATIONS MVP ABOUT GIFT CARDS Careers ORDER ONLINE © 2025 Duffy's Sports Grill

Back Interested in working with us? Join the fastest growing sports-themed casual fine dining restaurant in Florida! Apply Here Are you a Team Player? CLICK HERE FOR W2 For Employment Verification CLICK HERE Or call 1-800-308-2211 Corporate Sponsors & Donations So that we can say "yes" to all the non-profit groups that approach us, our corporate donations are limited to gift cards for silent auctions or fundraiser nights.
